Html:
In Rawr v.2.1.0, the base parry of an 80 warrior is calculated as 0%.  Don't warriors have 5% base parry, giving them a parry of 4.4% against level 83 mobs?

Thanks.
I thought I added that, what race are you? Maybe I missed one.

Nevermind, don't need your race. Looks like I only added it to humans. It'll be added to the rest in the next build, you can get the change from source or just pick human until a new release is done. Thanks for the find.

Holy
